title: VTech Upgraded Baby Monitor Advanced HQ Max, 7" Screen, Pan Tilt Zoom Video Baby Monitor with Camera and Audio, IPS Screen, Touch Control Multi-Color Night Light, 2-Way Talk, Lullabies, No WiFi
description: Watch over your little one at home with the VTech Advanced HQ Max series video baby monitor. Designed after your parenting needs, this 7" IPS LCD Screen baby monitor offers wide viewing and enhanced color accuracy, the camera has pan and tilt capability with 4x zoom and 110° wide angle view. It served with rechargeable battery that has up to 12 hours of video streaming. Magnify monitoring the nursery's temperature, motion and sound to maintain a cozy environment in the nursery. Night vision video activates in the low light conditions. Soothe your baby using touch multi-color night light, soothing sounds and lullabies along with 2-way talk to pacify them when they are under distress. The secure 2.4GHz wireless connection and an impressive 1,000 feet range, you can freely move about your home without interruption to the video feed. No Wi-Fi required - just plug in and start monitoring with ease.
